translation.description: Passionate about technology and it's possibilities.
translation.aboutMe: Since my childhood, I have been passionate about technology, so I decided to combine the useful with the pleasant, and today I am a fullstack developer. I don't have formal experience, like CLT, but I am a freelancer with some projects I am working on. I am eager to learn day by day and improve every aspect that a true fullstack developer can offer.
translation.jvlfDesc: Website to show the fictitious PDTI/PSI 2025-26 of Banco do Brasil.
translation.medellinDesc: E-commerce of clothes and accessories. I participated in all development, from scratch to production.
translation.olieArtDesc: Simple portfolio website for a designer.
translation.restfulApiDesc: RESTful API that registers, retrieves, and updates students. Test-driven.
